Fit to Print

Add Hawk

Friday Night Fights
  • Sign Up!
  • Waiting List

$5 online or at the door

What happens when two experienced improv teams go head-to-head in this intense cagematch-style fight? Weirdness, insanity, and hilarity all around! Unfortunately, only one team will make it out alive... And you, the audience, decides who stays...and who gets thrown into a bog and becomes a super neat bog mummy in like, 400 years. You better not miss it! Friday Night Fights is every 1st and 3rd Friday. Hosted by Jay Robert Flewelling.

Purchase Tickets

Does your team want to compete?

We're always looking for new teams to compete in Friday Night Fights!
